title: Add delete button for simulations
description: Allow deleting a simulation from the tile UI (with confirmation). Should remove the simulation record and detach it from the tile, updating local caches and navigating back to /tile/:tileId.

title: On tile zoom: hide dot and place label top-left
description: When viewing a tile route (after zooming into a tile), hide the center dot marker for that tile and render the tile name label at the tile's top-left corner.

title: Support fetching simulation results via simulationId
description: Update Simulation model to include simulationId/resultJson/resultNpz and add UI+API helpers to fetch (and cache) simulation results from /simulate/<simulation_id>.

title: Map interaction lock not taking effect on tile routes
description: Map still pans/zooms on /tile/:tileId/* despite intended lock; enforce interaction disabling via react-map-gl props.

title: Tile create pane for simulation/plan
description: On /tile/:tileId?create=management-plan or ?create=simulation, show a settings pane (fields + validation) and a Create button that actually creates the record and links it to the tile.

title: Zoom into tile on route navigation
description: When navigating to a tile-specific route, automatically zoom/pan the view to that tile.

title: Nested tile simulation/plan routes
description: Add nested routes /tile/:tileId/simulation/:id and /tile/:tileId/management-plan/:id, and make simulation/plan cards navigate there.

title: Tile view: move back+tile info to right pane
description: On /tile/:id with no selection, right pane should show the same tile info as before (and a Back button). Left pane should only contain simulations/plans list + create, without tile info/back.

title: Refreshing /tile/:id shows error again
description: Reloading on /tile/:tileId now triggers a client error/overlay again. Likely due to unhandled promise rejection from asset fetch; make asset fetches non-throwing or catch errors.

title: Move plans/sims list + create to tile left pane
description: Change layout: Map tile selection shows only a 'Select tile' button that navigates to /tile/:id. On /tile/:id, show zoom + contextual right pane (no selection by default) and a left pane listing simulations/plans for the tile with create options; selecting updates the right pane via nested routes.

title: Lock map panning/zooming on tile routes
description: Disable map interactions (pan/zoom/rotate) when route matches /tile/:tileId or any subroute, so the map is fixed while working in tile context.

title: Tile page missing landcover/ocean details
description: Regression: /tile/:id no longer shows the landcover/ocean data sections (previews/coverage) that existed in the tile details panel.

title: Management-plans page retries forever on error
description: Auto-refresh useEffect re-triggers when list fetch fails (plans stays null), causing repeated requests / apparent infinite loading. Guard auto-refresh on error (and use !== null checks).

title: Tile route zoom sometimes throws 'Style is not done loading'
description: On /tile/:tileId (often after refresh), app hits ErrorBoundary with 'Style is not done loading'. Likely from fitBounds/flyTo before map style is ready; make zoom effect retry on idle and never throw.

title: Refreshing /tile/:tileId shows white screen
description: Reloading the app on a tile route causes a runtime error / blank screen. Make tile route resilient on cold start and avoid unhandled async errors.

title: Tile overview should retain sims/plans after back
description: After viewing /tile/:tileId/(simulation|management-plan)/:id and returning to /tile/:tileId, the tile pane should still show the tile's simulations/plans so context isn't lost.

title: Tile-only submenu with animation
description: Only show the TopNav secondary submenu when on /tile/:tileId, and animate it in/out on route changes.

title: Simulation create: agent dropdown
description: When creating a simulation, show available agents (from /simulate/agents) in a dropdown. Persist selection on the simulation record (via options) and use it when fetching results.

title: Context pane only on nested simulation/plan routes
description: When on /tile/:tileId/simulation/:id or /tile/:tileId/management-plan/:id, the right pane should only show the relevant context (simulation or plan) and hide create/new options.

title: Management plan + simulation pages list all
description: Make /simulations and /management-plans pages list all available simulations/plans (not tile-scoped), using existing PocketBase/Jotai state.

title: Run simulation via /simulation/:recordId/run
description: Replace simulationId+Fetch data UI with a single Run simulation button that calls GET /simulation/<simulation_record_id>/run (upload+run+cache). Update API helper + atoms accordingly.
